summary: Fixes mounted combat for the Custom Races mod.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple fix for the Custom Races mod. When mounted combat was introduced, a few lines in the races properties were missing. I simply added them with the appropriate numbers. Your character should hit enemies normally while on horseback now.

This is just the .esp with the fixes, you still have to download the core files from the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8720]Custom Races mod[/url] and installing the fix after. Current version compatible with Custom Races [b]1.54[/b]. Version 1.2 of this mod includes further fixes made by [b]AH1[/b].

Credits goes to [b]d_rail1602[/b] for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8720]Custom Races mod[/url], [b]TheOutlander[/b] for coming up with [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/699347-attention-mod-authors-mounted-combat-and-race-records/]the fix[/url] and [b]AH1[/b] for including an extra fix related to invisible armors and NPCs not recognizing your race. I recommend using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24168]RaceCompatibility for Dawnguard[/url] if you have the DLC installed.
author: Warvok
